Question: While **** spoke, Freud suddenly fainted and this person carried him to a couch.
Hints: In December 1937, this person left Zurich again for an extensive tour of India with Fowler McCormick.
This person spoke at meetings of the Psycho-Medical Society in London in 1913 and 1914.
Although **** was close to both parents he was rather disappointed in his father's academic approach to faith.
